resiliance.txt: You cannot be resiliant if you spend all of your mental energy on the past, blaming events outside of your control, where fault no longer mattered.
debating online.txt: You will never convince someone online, so just don't bother.
context switching.txt: Context switching is more expensive than you think.
control.txt: There are things in life that are within your control, and the rest that are not.
today.txt: Today is the result of actions and decisions of yesterday
story of the past.txt: Stop telling a story of the past and fully connect with the present
ask.txt: Always ask: 'If you didn't already do this, would you do it now?'
